name: AI & Azure Expedition
subtitle: Cape Town 2025
description: Immerse yourself in the world of artificial intelligence for an evening of discovery and insight. Following the AI Tour Johannesburg Conference, this special Cape Town event featured international and local speakers including Microsoft FTEs and Microsoft MVPs, all live and in-person!

name: .NET Conf 2024
subtitle: MSDUG Community Edition - South Africa
description: Welcome to .NET Conf South Africa – where innovation meets technology in the heart of Africa! With 2 tracks in each city and a lineup of 18+ expert speakers, this conference featured the latest .NET 9 announcements, enhanced performance, and expanded capabilities in web, mobile, IoT and cloud development.

name: Microsoft Season of AI 2024
subtitle: Cape Town & Johannesburg
description: Dive into the world of artificial intelligence for an evening filled with exploration and insight. Discover the latest advancements, engage in thought-provoking discussions, and gain a deeper understanding of AI's impact on our lives through this fascinating field.

name: .NET Conf 2023
subtitle: MSDUG Community South Africa
description: Welcome to .NET Conf South Africa – where innovation meets technology in the heart of Africa! With 2 tracks in each city and 18 expert speakers, this conference provided a platform for learning and networking around .NET 8 and the rapidly evolving .NET landscape.

name: Azure Bootcamp South Africa 2021
subtitle: MSDUG Community South Africa
description: We are excited to announce that Azure BootCamp South Africa (#AzureBootcampSouthAfrica) will be taking place on Thursday 30 September 2021!!
